short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play the Doge 2048 Game Offline version on your Google Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doge 2048 Offline Version (Only 1MB)

Play Doge 2048 on your Google Chrome Browser. Use your arrow keys to move the doges. When two tiles with the same doge, they merge into one and replace by new doge. Unlock all 11 doges to win the game!

1. Install extension
2. Click the Doge 2048 icon on the Chrome extension toolbar 
and then we will open a Doge 2048 for you to play the game! You don’t need to do anything else! You also can play Doge 2048 from any Chrome Tab.
Have fun!
